content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Streaming
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Streaming (
	[TransactionId] nvarchar(256),
	[CustomerId] nvarchar(256),
	[MovieId] nvarchar(256),
	[StreamStart] datetime2(7),
	[StreamEnd] datetime2(7),
	[CreatedDate] date,
	[UpdatedDate] date,
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Streaming',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Streaming
GO
